featured.text: However, the more generally accepted story is that the fortune cookie first 38 in either 1907 or 1914 in San Francisco, created by a Japanese immigrant, Makoto Hagiwara.
The fortune cookie was based on a Japanese snack, but Hagiwara sweetened the recipe to appeal to American 39 .

definition.zh_def: 一個日本姓氏，常見於日本文化和文學中。
definition.en_def: A Japanese surname commonly found in Japanese culture and literature.
definition.example: Hagiwara is a well-known name in Japanese poetry.
